Posts.Content: of course it is scary and yes it could be benign - 15 years ago I had a biopsy and it was benign. 6 years ago they found dcis in another place - everything is ok. I know of so many woman that are still here! including my mother (16 years ago she found a lump that was cancer) she is doing great Hugs, Dee
Posts.Title: Found a lump in my breast - scared

Posts.Content: I had delayed bilat diep in March. Post DIEP I developed a large hardened area on one upper area of foob which they said was Fat Necrosis.  Just had Phase 2 surgery which included lipo/fat grafting to try and cover it.  PS stated that during surgery had a tough time getting to and my chest is extremely inflammed trauma/red, I am only a week out from surgery so It is too early to determine ulitmately the results especially of the one issue area. Everything else looks ok, i guess as good as it gets.
Posts.Title: Fat necrosis after diep flap reconstruction
